selector-class-pattern.message: Use camelCase for CSS class names in modules. Example: .myButton instead of .my-button

selector-id-pattern.message: Use camelCase for CSS IDs. Example: #myElement instead of #my-element

scss/dollar-variable-pattern.message: Use kebab-case for CSS custom properties. Example: --my-color instead of --myColor

scss/at-mixin-pattern.message: Use kebab-case for CSS mixins. Example: @mixin my-mixin instead of @mixin myMixin

scss/at-function-pattern.message: Use kebab-case for CSS functions. Example: @function my-function instead of @function myFunction
